Title: Relates to increasing the state code enforcement powers of the secretary of state
Summary: Increases the state code enforcement powers of the secretary of state by establishing a state code enforcement office headed by an ombudsperson.
LawCode: Amd ยง381, add ยง381-a, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to increasing the state code enforcement powers of the secretary of state
